refnamediv.refpurpose: Generate SDL document for a PL module and return it as a varchar.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function generates a SDL for the procedures in a PL module the same way as /SOAP/services.xml is generated for the procedures in WS.SOAP.

refsect2.title: module
refsect2.para: Required. The name of the module to describe. This can be partial name.

refsect2.title: URL
refsect2.para: Optional (default is the current VSP path if in VSP context. Otherwise error). The URL to include in the SDL file

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: Returns the SDL document describing the module as an varchar value.
